channel.title: CVE Feed for The Helm Project -- Helm
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Helm Project -- Helm

item.title: CVE-2020-4053|2024-08-04T07:52:20.934Z -- the%20helm%20project -- helm
item.description: In Helm greater than or equal to 3.0.0 and less than 3.2.4, a path traversal attack is possible when installing Helm plugins from a tar archive over HTTP. It is possible for a malicious plugin author to inject a relative path into a plugin archive, and copy a file outside of the intended directory. This has been fixed in 3.2.4.
